titleStmt.title: May 27. 1651. For as much as the inhabitants of Pauls Church yard are much disturbed by the souldiers and others, ...
titleStmt.author: Barkstead, John, d. 1662.
Blundell, Benjamin.

notesStmt.note: Title from opening words of text.
Signed at end: Iohn Barkestead, Benjamin Blundell.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
